definition[0]: to hit someone or something many times quickly, especially using your fists (=closed hands)
example[0]: Diane leaned over and pummeled the pillows.
example[1]: The platoon was pummeled by heavy machine-gun fire.
example[2]: She flew at him, pummelling his chest with her fists.
example[3]: The cook pummelled at the dough.
definition[1]: to completely defeat someone at a sport
